dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Deluzio (for himself and Mr. Garbarino) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To increase the Federal share of the Patrick Leahy Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bipartisan Bulletproof Vest Partnership Program Expansion Act.
Section 2501 of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (34 U.S.C. 10531) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking 50 percent and inserting 60 percent; and
in subparagraph (B), by striking 50 percent and inserting 60 percent; and

paragraph.text: by striking subsection (h) and inserting the following:

subsection.text: There is authorized to be appropriated $60,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 through 2030 to carry out this part.
